page.title: 11Pit Jobs (Surface)
page.content: 1.{WINDERS}wind the cages that carry coal material and men. 2.{BANKSMEN}rap singles to the winder and onsetter for the cage to go down. 3.{FITTERS}maintain all the machinery on the surface. 4.{ELECTRICIANS}maintain all the electrical parts on the surface. 5.{BLACKSMITHS}see that all the tuff chains, and cages are in good order. 6.{WELDERS}fabricate jobs for underground and surface. 7.{YARD MEN}see that all the materials is got ready to go underground. 8.{JOINERS}make air doors for underground. 9.{SHAFT MEN}see that both shafts are in working order. 10.{WASHERMEN}work where all the coal is washed. 11.{LAMPROOM MEN}see that the lamps are in working order.
